item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the Coutura Collection. Delivering the perfect blend of sport and style for those on the move, this boldly distinctive radio sync solar chronograph provides effortless timekeeping excellence. Radio signals are received automatically to adjust the time and calendar throughout 25 world time zones. Framed by a world time bezel, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $650.00 - $286.98
(as of Nov 30,2022 13:09:55 UTC – Details)


From the Coutura Collection. Delivering the perfect blend of sport and style for those on the move, this boldly distinctive radio sync solar chronograph provides effortless timekeeping excellence. Radio signals are received automatically to adjust the time and calendar throughout 25 world time zones. Framed by a world time bezel, the black dial features chronograph and 24-hour subdials, power reserve and signal reception indicators, date calendar, and LumiBrite hands and markers. Crafted of two-tone stainless steel, with vigorously angular lines and vivid blue accents on dial and case, this versatile watch includes a glass caseback, sapphire crystal and screwdown cabochon crown. The chronograph function offers timing to 60 minutes in 1/5-second increments with split time measurement. Powered by any light source, with no battery change required, the Solar Cell is energy-efficient, with a 6-month power reserve when fully charged. 10 bar, 100M Water Resistant.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6 x 6 x 6 inches; 11.2 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ SSG010
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Product Specific batteries required. (included)
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 23, 2016
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Seiko Watch Corporation
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01HHCHHV8
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China
Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

Case Diameter: 44.5mm
The intricately patterned black dial with gold accents features a chronograph, radio signal reception display, power reserve indicator, date calendar, and LumiBrite hands and markers
The angular two-tone stainless steel case is paired with an integrated bracelet and includes a sapphire crystal and cabochon crown
Water-resistant to 10 bar, 100 meters (330 feet)
3-Year Manufacturer’s Warranty

Read more

Crafted of stainless steel, with a masterfully integrated case and band, this versatile collection combines rugged sport features and cutting-edge design with vigorously angular lines, creating a signature bold look.

Framed by a geometrically designed bezel and protected by a scratch-resistant sapphire crystal, the beautifully finished dials offer dimensional patterns and contrasting color accents and feature LumiBrite hands and intricately shaped markers.

Powered by light energy, with no battery change required, the rechargeable solar cell powers not only the time and date but advanced technology such as automatically adjusting Radio-Sync and chronograph movements ensuring that every Coutura delivers non-stop performance for today’s world.

All Coutura models have a water resistance of 100 meters and include a cabochon crown for the perfect combination of sport and dress style— appropriate for both every day and dress occasions.

Read more

Read more

Read more

Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

The Skagen Jorn aesthetic is simple, and works with every style. Slip on one of our men’s watches while you’re getting ready for any occasion and you’ll see your refined style take on a whole new level of sophistication.
Featuring a round stainless steel 41mm case, scratch-resistant mineral crystal glass, Quartz movement with 3-hand analog display, imported
Black 22MM stainless steel mesh band with a Safety Mesh Buckle closure
Water resistant up to 50m: Wearable while swimming in shallow water

Skagen

At Skagen, sustainability and timelessness are at the forefront of our design process, creating pieces to last a lifetime — with people and the planet in mind. We recognize the significance of our partnerships, suppliers, and material use and celebrate our selections — solar movement, planet-friendly leather, and upcycled/recycled materials. Sustainability isn’t a choice; it’s a lifestyle. Let’s live it.

DESIGN FEATURES

Previous page
Next page

WATCH CRAFTSMANSHIP

Responsible Materials

Thoughtful material choices include Recycled Stainless Steel, Ocean-bound plastic, using gold standard Leather Working Group Materials.

Timeless Craftsmanship

With over 30 years of watch making experience, Skagen is able to use our expertise to make high value and affordable product.

Iconic Attributes

Each element is carefully crafted to create a visual moment. Details like the hooded lug and premium mesh strap are signature to Skagen.

Design for Everyone

Our ethos is to consider the end user of our timepieces when designing. The value we impart on each watch makes it meaningful and useful for years.

MEET OUR COLLECTIONS

Previous page

  1. GRENEN

    Named after the iconic beach in Denmark where the Skagerrak and the Kattegat seas meet, this platform is a true representation of the Skagen brand.

    SEE NOW

  2. MELBYE

    Danish design is known for its emphasis on function, simple lines, and choice materials. This style exemplifies that with a look that tells more than time

    SEE MORE

  3. ANCHER

    Ancher is one of our most esteemed platforms, with chronograph movement, bold lines, a slim profile and hooded lugs. It’s everything you need, nothing you don’t.

    SEE NOW

  4. FREJA

    Feminine pieces that embody our Scandinavian sensibility of minimalistic simplicity with a strong sense of design.

    SEE NOW

  5. JORN

    The Jorn aesthetic is simple and works with every style. Slip on one of our watches while you’re getting ready for any occasion and you’ll see your refined style take on a new level of sophistication.

    SEE NOW

Next page

WORKING TOWARD A GREATER GOAL

TIME FOR CHANGE

We’re dedicated to being an environmental partner. We consistently evolve our position to find great collaborators aligned on a similar path.

DESIGN MAKING AN IMPACT

Throughout our processes, we consider every component of a watch or piece of jewelry, exploring ways to minimize our footprint on the planet.

WORKING TOWARD A GREATER GOAL

NOW- Reduce the use of virgin plastics across our supply chain. By 2025 – Design and produce styles that 100% meet our pro-planet criteria.

PLANET-FORWARD PACKAGING

We’re on a journey of becoming more environmentally sustainable. The paper on Skagen’s new core packaging is FSC certified.

Product Description

ABOUT US

CHEETAH has always been inspired by creativity and ingenuity. We’ve strived to bring new life into the industry by making good quality, fashionable watches and accessories that are both fun and accessible.

CHOOSE YOUR COLOR

Make you so fashionable

ABOUT THE MOVEMENT

Three-hand Quartz: This watch movement features a quartz crystal that oscillates when a current is applied to it.Multifunction: A Quartz movement with two separate sub-eyes for 1/10 seconds / seconds and date function.Chronograph: A multifunction watch with stopwatch functionality.

Mineral glass,high quality lenses ,clear and hard.Stainless steel bracelets are extremely durable and can last the lifetime of a watch with proper care

item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Each of our Fossil mens’ watches are built to last and embody the bold, creative spirit of their wearers. Through quality craftsmanship, premium features and a keen attention to detail, our watches are made for the everyday-wearer, the adventurer and everyone in between. Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $160.00 - $91.92
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:30:31 UTC – Details)


Each of our Fossil mens’ watches are built to last and embody the bold, creative spirit of their wearers. Through quality craftsmanship, premium features and a keen attention to detail, our watches are made for the everyday-wearer, the adventurer and everyone in between.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 2.83 x 3.54 x 3.54 inches; 2.6 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ FS5437
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 CR2 batteries required. (included)
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 2, 2018
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Fossil Watches
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B079D9VSZD

Fossil has always been inspired by American creativity and ingenuity. Since 1984, we’ve strived to bring new life into the industry by making quality, fashionable watches and accessories that were both fun and accessible
Taking our cues from 1960s-era architectural and automotive design, our Townsman has a clean, symmetrical style and elevated construction. Elegantly vaulted hands, beveled indices and a shapely case make this timepiece a classic for decades to come
Case size: 44mm; Band size: 22mm; quartz movement with three-hand chronograph display; hardened mineral crystal lens resists scratches; imported
Black stainless steel case with black dial; genuine dark brown leather band with adjustable buckle closure; interchangeable with all 22mm Fossil watch straps
Water resistant to 50m (165ft): suitable for short periods of recreational swimming and showering, but not diving or snorkeling; 5 ATM
Customize your watch with complimentary engraving at a local Fossil store. Engraving is available at participating U.S. and Canadian full-priced and outlet Fossil stores. This service is not applicable on all accessories

OUR STORY

FOSSIL WAS INSPIRED BY AMERICAN CREATIVITY AND INGENUITY

Bringing new life into the watch industry by making quality, fashionable watches that were both fun and accessible. Creativity was at the heart of everything we did.


DESIGN FEATURES

WHAT MAKES US, US

OUR PRODUCT

Our collections celebrate our love for all things vintage with a nod to mid-century design. Our elevated ethos takes root in each and every style.

OUR SUCCESS RECIPE

Optimism, authenticity and, of course, our creative spirit. Everything we make complements every style and fits every lifestyle.

OUR TINSPIRATION

What if a package could communicate the soul of a brand? Our famous tins came to embody our young, fun, authentic brand and creative culture.

SEND A MESSAGE

It only takes a few letters to make a piece personal. Plus: It’s free*. *Available at participating Fossil stores.

MEET OUR COLLECTIONS

Previous page

  1. FOSSIL BLUE

    This collection debuts with four new bands: rich leather, sportier silicone, classic solid steel bracelet and stainless steel mesh bracelet that’s inspired by shark-proof chainmail dive suits.

    SEE NOW

  2. INSCRIPTION

    The square-shaped case was a turning point in watchmaking history. What’s old is new again—this archival Inscription watch is upgraded with a two-layered dial and exposed screws on its topring.

    SEE NOW

  3. BRONSON

    This rugged watch embodies a pioneering spirit. With bold, easy-read indices and luminescent accents, its oversized dial makes it an ideal timepiece for day or night.

    SEE NOW

  4. NEUTRA CHRONOGRAPH

    Refined and versatile, it’s made to be dressed up or dressed down.

    SEE NOW

  5. TOWNSMAN AUTOMATIC

    The skeleton dial on this 1950s-inspired timepiece reveals the intricate, hand-assembled inner workings. The mainspring is wound automatically from the motion of the wearer’s arm—no battery needed.

    SEE NOW

Next page

TIME FOR CHANGE

DESIGN FOR THE FUTURE

Design and produce 100% of our products to meet our pro-planet criteria by 2025.

PRO-PLANET PACKAGING
